inclusion.criterion: study by a research sonographer at the time of the ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: informed consent document will be given to them for their review
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: imaging prior to ED ultrasound performed to evaluate the RLQ
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and vomiting. Ultrasound revealed several gallstones and biliary sludge.
